short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lock you page to have privacy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lock Page is a simple tool to hide you webpage content from unwanted sights. You can hide a specific webpage or multiple webpages from being seen when you are in public or sharing a you computer during a meeting or a lecture session.
